thread.title: Printable Oscars Ballot 2017: All the Nominees and More | Vanity Fair
thread.title_full: Printable Oscars Ballot 2017: All the Nominees and More | Vanity Fair

author: Vanity Fair
title: Printable Oscars Ballot 2017: All the Nominees and More | Vanity Fair
text: Twitter It’s that time of year: download our handy ballot for the 2017 Oscars, which take place this Sunday, February 26. The below ballot is easily accessible here , and is presented by Vanity Fair and iTunes Movies. But we didn’t stop there: for the first year, we’re featuring an interactive Oscar ballot , where you can find out more information about all the nominees, make your picks, and e-mail yourself a copy. Think of it this way: the printable ballot for you and all of your guests, and the interactive ballot for sharing digitally with all your Facebook friends and e-mail pen pals. And that’s still not all! V.F. HWD’s Little Gold Men podcast crew is posting a new episode each day of this week. Check those out here . And, of course, we’ll be covering all things Oscars on VF.com this week. So, without further ado: here’s a preview of the printable ballot. And here’s the easy-to-print version .
